cont.entity_a: Excellent pairing with DarkVoice 336 SE tube amplifier and IFI Black Label portable DAC amp.

Sound quality is amazing from highs to lows, with crisp and clear sound. Clear, bright highs and a warm sound signature. The sound is balanced with incredible clarity and detail. Great for music mastering and mixing due to accuracy and detail. Sound stage is well-defined.
cont.entity_b: Sound is clear and loud with prominent treble and weak bass. Some users experience white noise in the background.

cont.entity_a: The headphones are comfortable and can be worn for extended periods. Comfortable fit after breaking in, but initial tightness may require adjustment.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable clip-on design. Fit well but may cause discomfort on long runs in hot weather. Fit around the ear is too loose, affecting sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Requires a powerful amp to drive them to full potential. Requires a proper amp to avoid sounding dull and lifeless.
Open-back design does not provide noise cancellation. Not suitable for noisy environments due to open-back design.
cont.entity_b: Only one cord is retractable. Retractable cord feature helps prevent tangling.

cont.entity_a: Bass is extended and well-articulated. The bass is tight and controlled.
Very good value for money, especially compared to models priced between $500 and $700.
Build quality issues with cable connections, leading to audio cutouts. Durable and long-lasting, with replaceable ear pads and cables.
cont.entity_b: Cables are thin, potentially affecting long-term durability.
